entry.title: 👑 NEW APPOINTMENT: Vinny2times Named Head of VIP Management
entry.summary: Fire22 announces the appointment of Vinny2times as Head of VIP Management, overseeing Tier 3 VIP Concierge services.
entry.content:
👑 Leadership Appointment: VIP Management Department

Effective Date: August 28, 2025

Department: VIP Management 💎

New Role: Head of VIP Management

🎯 Announcement Details:

Fire22 is pleased to announce the appointment of Vinny2times as Head of VIP Management, effective immediately.

👤 Contact Information:

  • 📧 Email: vinny2times@vip.fire22
  • 💬 Slack: @vinny2times
  • 📱 Telegram: @fire22_vip
  • 📞 Phone: +1-555-0950

🏆 Key Responsibilities:

  • 🌟 VIP Tier 3 (Concierge) customer management
  • 💎 High-roller relationship management
  • 👑 VIP escalation handling and resolution
  • 🎪 Exclusive VIP events and benefits coordination
  • 📊 VIP program strategy and optimization

🎯 VIP Service Tier Integration:

Vinny2times will oversee our premium service offerings:

  • Tier 3 VIP Concierge: $250K+ lifetime customers
  • Response Time: 15-30 minutes dedicated support
  • Benefits: 1.5% fee discount, 3x limits, personal manager
  • White-glove Service: Complete concierge experience

📞 Contact Channels:

VIP customers and team members can reach Vinny2times through:

  • 🚨 VIP Escalation Portal: https://vinny2times.fire22.workers.dev/escalation/
  • 💎 High Roller Review: https://vinny2times.fire22.workers.dev/high-roller-review/
  • 📱 Telegram VIP Channel: @fire22_vip
  • 📋 Direct Scheduling: https://vinny2times.fire22.workers.dev/schedule/

All VIP-related inquiries should now be directed to Vinny2times and his team.

🤖 Generated by Fire22 Communications Department
